page.title: 20Those who went on the trip.
page.content:
The children that went to Lundy were from Class 4 of Uplands County Primary School, Stroud, Gloucestershire.They were:{Louise Carlill,Joanne Castleton, {Sarah James,Lucy Martin,Heather Remes, {Charlotte Owen,Jamie Chandler,Toby {Dangerfield,Alistair Day,Andrew Fisk, {Martin Glastonbury,Michael Hearfield, {David Hinchliffe,Matthew Jones,Ryan {Leach,Colin Penney,James Perryman,Ben {Rainger,Lee Timbrell and Alex and {Russell Watkins.}They were all 10 or 11 years old.
The trip was organised by{Beris {Hanks},the Deputy Head,and he was accompanied by another member of staff {Jacqueline Dench}. Their children,{ {Ellen and Matthew Dench}(7 &9 ) and {Karl Hanks}(7) also went.
